sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import {useTranslation} from "react-i18next"; export const AccountingDashboard = () => { const {t} = useTranslation('common'); return (
{t('acc.dashboard.revenueCriteriaCharts')}
{t('acc.dashboard.thisMonthGrossIncome')}: 12.335.500.000 đ
{t('acc.dashboard.thisMonthNetRevenue')}: 11.335.500.000 đ
{t('acc.dashboard.thisMonthCOGS')}: 9.230.500.000 đ
{t('acc.dashboard.thisMonthProductRevenue')}: 14.335.500.000 đ
{t('acc.dashboard.thisMonthDeductionRevenue')}: 5.500.000 đ
{t('acc.dashboard.netRevenueChart')}
{t('acc.dashboard.revenuePercentByProductsGroupChart')}
{t('acc.dashboard.productRevenueRankChart')}
); }
